title: nf-core/variantpipeline pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

fastq.errorMessage: FastQ file for long-reads must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

bam.errorMessage: BAM file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bam'

bai.errorMessage: BAM index file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bai'

vcf.errorMessage: VCF file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.vcf'

bed.errorMessage: BED file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bed'
